alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 08 at 10:09PM CDT until May 16 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Two Rivers River near Hallock affecting Kittson County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO MONDAY, MAY 16... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Two Rivers River near Hallock. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to Monday, May 16. * IMPACTS...At 804.5 feet, Backup at Reach 2 Dike, cemetery road at 6th St S. Shut storm valve. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 801.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday afternoon to a crest of 803.3 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 802.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
